member.name: T:NStructuredDataModel.Yaml.YamlImporter
member.summary: Traverses a yaml document and constructs a dynamic object model from it.

member.name: M:NStructuredDataModel.Yaml.YamlImporter.#ctor(YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.YamlDocument,NStructuredDataModel.AbstractNode)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The dynamic object to update with the object model.

member.name: M:NStructuredDataModel.Yaml.YamlImporter.SetObjectValue(NStructuredDataModel.AbstractNode,System.String)
member.summary: This method is called for YAML mapping nodes, which are objects with properties. No scalar value is being set; we just create a variable node for this property, if one doesn't exist.
